name: men in black
description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

name: the fifth element
description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

name: kingsman: the secret service
description: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

name: van helsing
description: The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.

name: the avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

name: finding nemo
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

name: the menu
description: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.

name: fight club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

name: the northman
description: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.

name: joker
description: The rise of Arthur Fleck, from aspiring stand-up comedian and pariah to Gotham's clown prince and leader of the revolution.
